goal.ch: The course covers all the basics of programming in Python, as well as general computer programming concepts and techniques. The main objective of this course is to inspire students’ interest in programming and equip them with the appropriate skills in analyzing and interpreting the data to come to a sound and reasonable decision. Each student has access to hands-on practice materials, labs, quizzes, and assessments to learn how to utilize the skills and knowledge gained on the course and interact with some real-life programming tasks and situations. Students who complete the course will be able to accomplish coding tasks related to the basics of programming in the Python language, and to understand the fundamental notions and techniques used in object-oriented programming.
goal.en: The course covers all the basics of programming in Python, as well as general computer programming concepts and techniques. The main objective of this course is to inspire students’ interest in programming and equip them with the appropriate skills in analyzing and interpreting the data to come to a sound and reasonable decision. Each student has access to hands-on practice materials, labs, quizzes, and assessments to learn how to utilize the skills and knowledge gained on the course and interact with some real-life programming tasks and situations. Students who complete the course will be able to accomplish coding tasks related to the basics of programming in the Python language, and to understand the fundamental notions and techniques used in object-oriented programming.

outline.ch:
01 甚麼是計算機程式?、Python 環境架設、第一個 Python 程式
02 Python 基本語法、變數與資料型態、基本輸入與輸出
03 Python 基本語法、運算思維的介紹
04 程式流程的控制: if-else
05 程式流程的控制: for, while
06 串列, 集合, 矩陣
